name: df-asp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(casp, cmpt(s0, casa, cmpt(s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), cint(crab(s2, cin(cfv(csubrg, cv(s0)), cfv(clss, cv(s0))), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ AlgSpan =(s0 ∈ AssAlg ↦(s1 ∈ P((Base ` s0))↦ ⋂ { s2 ∈((SubRing ` s0)⋂(LSubSp ` s0))| s1 ⊆ s2 }))
comment: Define the algebraic span of a set of vectors in an algebra. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)
